PTSN.JK.summary: PT Sat Nusapersada Tbk provides electronic manufacturing services in Indonesia. The company offers metal stamping services for the electronics industry; management consulting services; and plastic molding and assembling services. It provides components, parts, and assemblies for network equipment and computers, consumer electronics and devices, multimedia peripherals, and automotive electronic components. The company also has operations in Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, the Philippines, Europe, and the United States. PT Sat Nusapersada Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Batam, Indonesia.
